summary: NUMBER 1 SPARK PLUG BLEW OUT WITH SUCH FORCE THAT IT BROKE THE IGNITION COILS SCREW HOLE. I HAD TO REPLACE THE IGNITION COIL, PLUG AND INSTALL A HELI COIL KIT. I WAS PULLING OUT OF THE BANK DRIVE THRU ONTO A ROAD AT THE TIME. I WAS STRANDED AND HAD TO HAVE THE VEHICLE TOWED HOME . I REAMED THE REMAINING PLUG HOLE AND HAD TO RE-THREAD 5 OTHERS.

A BUS OPERATOR IN NEW JERSEY IS OPERATING WITHOUT THE PROPER INSURANCE FILINGS.  3CM SOLUTIONS (DOT # [XXX]).  THEY ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE 5 MILLION IN COVERAGE AND AS OF 7/28 ONLY HAS 1 MILLION.  30+ BUSES HAVE BEEN ON THE ROAD THE LAST COUPLE OF DAYS WITH INVALID INSURANCE.  THIS IS A MAJOR PUBLIC SAFETY ISSUE!      INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
